channel.title: Why am I still banned?
channel.description: Title says it all, even MITB said I shouldn't have been banned for a rule that wasn't on the list until AFTER I broke it...

item.title: Why am I still banned?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

And just to hit the nail on the head,

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Mr. Extivium that’s a very fitting email, it just happens Lorgous is also a known griefer. (I’m not sure if everyone can see his email)

Read full topic

item.title: Why am I still banned?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I’m locking this as they match your IP to the T and seem to all be registered one after the other when the other accounts were banned.

You obviously have been lying this entire time, no reason for us to continue this any more.

Read full topic

item.title: Why am I still banned?
item.dc:creator: @shamcooly shamcooly
item.description:
@shamcooly wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:22, topic:401066”]Well now that I’ve looked into you, I noticed you also go by the name ‘Lorgous’, and and another by the name ‘LordMagii’, who both were banned for griefing.

Therefor we have three cases of ban evasion here, good luck getting unbanned.[/quote]

I deny those accusations.

Read full topic

item.title: Why am I still banned?

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Well now that I’ve looked into you, I noticed you also go by the name ‘Lorgous’, and and another by the name ‘LordMagii’, who both were banned for griefing.

item.title: Why am I still banned?
item.dc:creator: @shamcooly shamcooly
item.description:
@shamcooly wrote:

Davidi2:

So you guys post on the same forum while at each others houses?

Precisely. His IP doesn’t match mine because he rarely comes to my house. But I go to his all the time. My IPs(this one) and his, are the only 2 I’ve used. It’s pretty much been this way for years. If you look at our post histories from all the mopar sites, you can tell we’re 2 different people(dating way back to 2006). And I haven’t ban evaded? If you check my forum acc or w/e, I’ve never changed moparcraft usernames before. It’s always been “Extivium”

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:16, topic:401066”]Where is this complete crap about him stopping after me telling him to coming from? He has the same IP as you which means he’s either you or your Brother so to be honest I smell a biased post.

I also do not recall you being online, or even present at that area. That would indicate you’re his brother thus backing up the ban evasion statement even more, so either way he’s breaking the rules.

Also, his ability to create a thread and complain on it, while denying all rules he broke just shows that he’s not to be trusted.[/quote]

Of course one of my friends will back me up, just as all of your mod friends are backing you up. Only difference is, all of you have more power on this server/forum than we do. I’m not exactly complaining, you could say I am trying to point out the corruption in some of the staff here. And your failure to admit a wrongful ban.

Read full topic

@badger41 wrote:

I smell bull shit, does anyone else?

item.title: Why am I still banned?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Where is this complete crap about him stopping after me telling him to coming from? He has the same IP as you which means he’s either you or your Brother so to be honest I smell a biased post.

I also do not recall you being online, or even present at that area. That would indicate you’re his brother thus backing up the ban evasion statement even more, so either way he’s breaking the rules.

Also, his ability to create a thread and complain on it, while denying all rules he broke just shows that he’s not to be trusted.

Read full topic

item.title: Why am I still banned?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar_X Mr Mopar X
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar_X wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:14, topic:401066”][quote]Why the hell do you and all the other moderators back each other up when you know you are wrong? The rule was so unclear that there was no way for him to know spawn killing was allowed except when Tom told him it wasn’t allowed, however, he stopped after Tom said it wasn’t allowed.[/quote]Usually we back each other up (not that if a majority of the staff agrees on something that means they are wrong…) because we need to come to a consensus about how we punish people. We have guidelines about how long punishments should be, and personally I don’t think one person that couldn’t be asked to read the rules properly should cause us to go against each other. To me it sounds like he didn’t stop after Tom said it wasn’t allowed, he continued to push the line and then continued to break more rules afterwards (respect, etc)

I also don’t see how people can even try to say it wasn’t pretty obvious what the rules said, there was a specific ‘PvP rule’ that said no pvp in/near the spawn area. If a player spawns at a bed, that’s their spawn area. I made it more specific (to include beds specifically, to prevent someone from trying to wheedle there way out of breaking that rule again) after the fact, but that doesn’t change that it it did say no pvp in the spawn area.

[quote]Even if the ban stands, why would you ban him any longer?[/quote]Two words: ban evasion. He clearly does not understand the concept of following the rules, he didn’t stop right when he learned it was against the rules.

Personally I do not believe he even read the rules until he was banned, and then went to look for an excuse to try and get unbanned.

As for me not liking him, I’ve never even seen him on the server before, or talked to him before his ‘Tom abused me’ thread. As for what banning is, you’re mistaken. It can be used to rid the server of people (perm bans for breaking the heavier rules) just as often as it is used punish people as ‘a lesson’ (for smaller amounts of griefing)[/quote]

Okay, well I understand that. However, I was an eye witness to the situation and he did indeed stop after Tom told him to. And I don’t if he is ban evading or not, but if he did that is his fault.

Read full topic

item.title: Why am I still banned?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Why the hell do you and all the other moderators back each other up when you know you are wrong? The rule was so unclear that there was no way for him to know spawn killing was allowed except when Tom told him it wasn't allowed, however, he stopped after Tom said it wasn't allowed.
Usually we back each other up (not that if a majority of the staff agrees on something that means they are wrong..) because we need to come to a consensus about how we punish people. We have guidelines about how long punishments should be, and personally I don't think one person that couldn't be asked to read the rules properly should cause us to go against each other. To me it sounds like he didn't stop after Tom said it wasn't allowed, he continued to push the line and then continued to break more rules afterwards (respect, etc)

I also don’t see how people can even try to say it wasn’t pretty obvious what the rules said, there was a specific ‘PvP rule’ that said no pvp in/near the spawn area. If a player spawns at a bed, that’s their spawn area. I made it more specific (to include beds specifically, to prevent someone from trying to wheedle there way out of breaking that rule again) after the fact, but that doesn’t change that it it did say no pvp in the spawn area.

Even if the ban stands, why would you ban him any longer?
Two words: ban evasion. He clearly does not understand the concept of following the rules, he didn't stop right when he learned it was against the rules.

Personally I do not believe he even read the rules until he was banned, and then went to look for an excuse to try and get unbanned.

As for me not liking him, I’ve never even seen him on the server before, or talked to him before his ‘Tom abused me’ thread. As for what banning is, you’re mistaken. It can be used to rid the server of people (perm bans for breaking the heavier rules) just as often as it is used punish people as ‘a lesson’ (for smaller amounts of griefing)

Read full topic

item.title: Why am I still banned?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar_X Mr Mopar X
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar_X wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:12, topic:401066”][quote author=PLayRooney link=topic=498123.msg3642971#msg3642971 date=1309153049]
So a mod banned you because he assumed a rule was implaced for whatever you did?
[/quote]He was banned for spawn killing, when there was a rule that did state (yes I admit that it was a bit outdated, but the concept was the same ) you cannot PVP where people spawn.[/quote]

Why the hell do you and all the other moderators back each other up when you know you are wrong? The rule was so unclear that there was no way for him to know spawn killing was allowed except when Tom told him it wasn’t allowed, however, he stopped after Tom said it wasn’t allowed.

Besides, I am pretty sure Moparisthebest has more authority than you do. Even if the ban stands, why would you ban him any longer? He clearly understands it is against the rules and I am sure he won’t do it again. Banning is used to teach users a lesson, not to rid them of the server because you don’t like them.

Read full topic

item.title: Why am I still banned?
item.dc:creator: @shamcooly shamcooly
item.description:
@shamcooly wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:2, topic:401066”]It was on the list though, any one should have been able to interpret ‘spawn’ to include homes/beds…

I made it more clear after your ban, to prevent people trying to use the same excuse as you when they break the rule.

This is all not the mention the fact you’ve been evading and such.[/quote]

Before I got banned it said “no killing spawn city”. That’s EXTREMELY unclear. If you can’t kill someone in their own city how can you raid etc? I was only banned because Tom doesn’t like me. I didn’t damage anything. I also stopped when he said that its apparently a rule.

This is all not the mention the fact you’ve been evading and such.
[/quote]…And I haven’t been ban evading? I only have one account…

Read full topic

This is all not the mention the fact you’ve been evading and such.
